Sentencas: Highly performing perovskite-based anodes for methane mixtures-fueled solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC) are proposed.
Titulo: Pd-doped perovskite-based SOFC anodes for biogas

Sentencas: Catalytic activities of La0.6Sr0.4Fe1-xPdxO3-delta (LSFPd) with x = 0.05, 0.1 toward dry reforming of methane (DMR) and partial oxidation of methane (POM) reactions are investigated.
Titulo: Pd-doped perovskite-based SOFC anodes for biogas

Sentencas: The addition of (30 wt%) Ce0.85Gd0.15O2-delta (GDC) and of (30 wt%) Ni(5 wt%)-GDC to the perovskite compounds was evaluated to enhance both electrocatalytic and electrochemical properties.
Titulo: Pd-doped perovskite-based SOFC anodes for biogas

Sentencas: Electrolyte-supported cells based on La0.8Sr0.2Ga0.8Mg0.2O3-delta (LSGM) pellets and LSFPd perovskite oxides at both electrodes are fabricated and tested using CH4, CH4/Ar and CH4/CO2 mixtures in the 750-850 degrees C temperature range.
Titulo: Pd-doped perovskite-based SOFC anodes for biogas

Sentencas: Fuel cell tests using anodic mixtures such as LSFPd/GDC and LSFPd/Ni-GDC are also performed.
Titulo: Pd-doped perovskite-based SOFC anodes for biogas

Sentencas: A discussion based on the comparison between catalytic and electrochemical results and on the possible reforming and/or oxidation reactions taking place at the anode is detailed.
Titulo: Pd-doped perovskite-based SOFC anodes for biogas
